425630.name: Jump Tanks Original Soundtrack
425630.description:
The Jump Tanks Original Soundtrack by Patrick Lee features music created exclusively for Jump Tanks. The album features "Jimmy" Hiroyuki Nakagawa and Sohei Takatani on taiko drums and traditional Japanese instruments.

Full Track List:

  • 01 Peninsula
  • 02 China Clipper
  • 03 The Island City
  • 04 Expert Opinion
  • 05 Drum Sketch
  • 06 Money Cat
  • 07 The Sound of Cherry Blossoms
  • 08 Alameda
  • 09 You & I
  • 10 The Neptune Dorado
  • 11 Museum Ship
  • 12 The Island City (Remix)

Patrick Lee's Official Music Site:


Audio files will be placed in your Jump Tanks folder in the Steam directory:
SteamLibrary\SteamApps\common\JumpTanks\DLC\OriginalSoundtrack
425630.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
